name: Corvette
description: Cultivate a piece of home decor that requires zero maintenance with this LEGO® Icons Dried Flower Centerpiece (10314). An immersive building project for adults, the set is bursting with vibrant blooms inspired by the colors of fall and includes a gerbera and rose as its focal point. Once it’s complete, you can use it as a striking centerpiece or hang it as flower wall decor to create a floral display to cherish forever.
